page.title: 01 Introduction
page.content: Introduction Our Domesday block covers an area approximately 15 km North-West of Durham City in the North-East of England .It is a rural area containing the small former mining village of {Burnhope}and the growing dormitory village of{Lanchester.}Our block contains some of the most beautiful scenery in Durham County.Lanchester is 114 metres above sea level while Burnhope is 258 metres above sea level. The villages are surrounded by farming land. Most of the farmers grow wheat,barley and grass and keep sheep and cows.There are few employment oportunites in our block.Many people from Lanchester travel to Durham and Newcastle to work. We found many interesting and exciting facts about our study.
